731051f-b.title: Bridges - Harlem River Bridges - University Heights Bridge.
731051f-b.text:
University Heights Bridge, across the Harlem River at West 207th Street (Manhattan (left) and West Fordham Road, Bronx. This is a set of 3 views taken the same day and are in a northerly direction from about
West 205th Street, Manhattan.
June 8, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
(not a dry mount item).

730907f-b.title: Bridges - Harlem River Bridges - Park Avenue Bridge - New York Central Railroad Bridge.
730907f-b.text:
Park Ave. Bridge of the New York Central Railroad, across the Harlem River, looking towards the Bronx from Manhattan. The Manhattan approach to the Bridge is East 134th Street. This is a set of 3 views.
DDecember 16, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(not a dry mount item).

730907f-c.title: Bridges - Harlem River Bridges - Park Avenue Bridge - New York Central Railroad Bridge.
730907f-c.text:

DDecember 16, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(not a dry mount item).

730907f-a.title: Bridges - Harlem River Bridges - Park Avenue Bridge - New York Central Railroad Bridge.

DDecember 16, 1936.

(not a dry mount item).

731110f-a.title: Bridges - Harlem River Bridges - 153rd Street Bridge.
731110f-a.text:
153rd Street Bridge; over R.R. tracks east from, but not including
Grand Concourse in the Bronx.
July 7, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

731052f-a.title: Bridges - Harlem River Bridges - University Heights Bridge - [View from Cedar Avenue in Bronx.]
731052f-a.text:
Harlem River Bridges: The University Heights Bridge across the Harlem River at West 207th Street in Manhattan (left), as viewed
westerly from Cedar Ave. in the Bronx.
December 26, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
